reviewText: Bought this set for a family member and they loved them.  I personally don't care for novelas, but if you do, they are highly recommended.

This is a great series. I was impressed with the way they interrelated the story lines with the different locations. It was easy to keep up with the different characters. They were exciting characters at that. The suspense kept me up for hours not wanting to wait for the next episode to see what  would happen next. I couldn't wait. When it was over I had withdrawals I wanted more. Cant get enough when something is that good. I didn't even know after watching one and two that there was a 2 La Guerra total. Once I found out I just had to buy it. I'm glad I did for it was awesome MORE SIRS PLEASE MORE....

so i just received my second season of "EL CARTEL DE LOS SAPOS"i couldn't beleive it at first,when they knocked on my door,and it was UPS,my daughter shows me the box,she opened it and i was YEEES YEEEESS!!WOOOOO HOOOOOOO!!i was thrilled and super dooper exited! they say its as good as the first season,cant wait! package arrived way before scheduled and in perfect conditions...buy it, you won't regret it! thanks amazon and lily's records!!getting ready 4 the shoooow
The first disk 2nd chapter did not show.  I am so disapoin

Series was great!. On some of the last episodes the recording on the dvd were hard to play as my dvd player could not play some parts and was disappointing. However, the majority of the series was watchable.
Serie cruda pero que aborda la realidad de una epoca dificil en la historia reciente de Colombia y el impacto en paises cercanos

The second part of the cartel soap opera, which takes you where you could imagine before. Great action, music, special effects. I can't just watch one episode, and once you finish, you want to watch it again.

Esta serie es buena pero no tan buena como para tirar mas de 20 pesos en la basura por ella. Buena suerte encontrando gente que este dispuesta a pagar lo que piden por ella.

Por lo menos vendenla en un precio razonable..

No tan buena como la primera pero la historia esta bien contada.... A diferencia que aquellos que odiamos en la primera ahora los adoramos........ Pera que Manolo Cardona no diese continuidad a su personaje de Fresita.... Como sea me gusto mucho.

the recording of this video is at the hihgest quality, the cartel 2 is superg, the story is very interesting, the acting by the actors is excellent, and the shipping from the seller for you  to get fast this product is excellent, i reccommend it.
